thread.title: Perfect Paris Boutique Hotel -
thread.title_full: Perfect Paris Boutique Hotel - Review of Hotel Madeleine Plaza, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Spacelady2013
title: Perfect Paris Boutique Hotel -
text:
My second stay at this lovely oasis. Service is excellent. Location is in Place Madeleine. Wonderful designer boutiques, cafes, restaurants right there. Madeleine Cathedral is breathtaking. Location is only a couple blocks from Place de la Concorde, Rue de Rivoli, Champs de l'Eyssee, Opera, etc. You cannot beat this wonderful little gem.
Room Tip: Request a room adjacent to Cathedral for full impact of the bustling Platz. See more room tips
